TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TitleFormat extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定在 控制項中顯示月份的標題格式。

span.span: Specifies the title format for the displayed month in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉，代表不同的標題格式控制項。The enumeration represents the different title formats for the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何變更預設的格式從行事曆標題 (`MonthYear`) 至`Month`格式。The following code example demonstrates how to change the calendar title from the default format (`MonthYear`) to the `Month` format. 若要執行此範例，建立名為 Web Form 網頁`WebForm1`，並取代`Page_load`範例程式碼的方法。To run the example, create a Web Forms page named `WebForm1`, and replace the `Page_load` method with the example code. [!code-csharp[TitleFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TitleFormat/CS/titleformat.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TitleFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TitleFormat/VB/titleformat.vb#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[CalendarTitleFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarTitleFormat/CS/calendartitleformatcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CalendarTitleFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarTitleFormat/VB/calendartitleformatvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.TitleFormat Month = int32(0)

summary.span: 標題只顯示月份，不顯示年份 (例如，「1 月」)。

span.span: Displays the title with the month but not the year (for example, "January").

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.TitleFormat MonthYear = int32(1)

summary.span: 標題同時顯示月份和年份 (例如，「2000 年 1 月」)。

span.span: Displays the title with both the month and the year (for example, "January 2000").
